We had a very pleasant stay at Sandpiper House and wouldn't hesitate to return again -- in fact, we plan to! We often travel thru this area with either a box trailer or a flatbed in tow, and have found this place able to accommodate our need for a long wide driveway. (We're estimating the driveway length to be 80-90' long, double car width.) While the drive is downward sloped, it works! -- and not just every place does with a ride that size!
Besides that, the place is clean and well cared for. The home had everything we needed to cook a decent meal and eat at a dining room table, wash and dry a load of laundry, relax in a restful bath, etc. It's the kind of place you feel inclined to remove your shoes at the door -- so of course, we did. The host was friendly and helpful, and quick to reply. All in all, we were well suited during our time there, and we would recommend this home to anyone.
